actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to repeal certain provisions of law relating to the private carriage of letters.

summary.text: Repeals restrictions on, and requirements for, the private carriage of letters. Eliminates criminal penalties for such carriage.

titles.title: A bill to repeal certain provisions of law relating to the private carriage of letters.
